page.title: 09THE FIRE BRIGADE IN W WIGHT
page.content: My name is Fireman Smith,I am a Fireman.I start work on a Monday morning at 6am, with a parade for duties.There are 8 of us.First we check all of our equipment,the ladder, ropes,fill rescue tender with water, then we have breakfast followed by Drill.We practise ladder drills from a fire tower,and rescuing people from smoke filled buildings.If an alarm bell rings we drop what we are doing, run to the engines,picking up the tape telling us where the fire is,our lights flashing and alarms sounding. After tackling the fire we return to the station for a late lunch.During the afternoon we check more equipment and finish work at 6pm.We hand over to the nightwatch.They work until 6am. I work 2 days on and 2 days off.It is exciting work. Jamie Hunt 8 years
